title: Calories in 1 Cup Steamed Broccoli
meta_description: Learn calories in 1 cup steamed broccoli—about 55 kcal—with full nutrition facts, macros, fiber details, and easy tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Chopped broccoli florets, steamed without added fat, salt, or seasonings; 1 cup ≈156 g cooked weight.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by broccoli variety, freshness, cooking time, and added ingredients. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One cup of steamed broccoli provides ~55 kcal, 4 g protein, and 5 g fiber.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged foods.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup steamed broccoli?
faqs.a: Approximately 55 kcal for 1 cup (156 g) plain steamed broccoli.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 1 cup steamed broccoli?
faqs.a: About 4 g of protein per cup.
Yes, around 5 g of dietary fiber per cup, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in steamed broccoli?
faqs.a: 11 g total carbs per cup, mostly from natural sugars and fiber.

faqs.q: How does steaming affect broccoli calories?
faqs.a: Steaming retains nutrients and keeps calories low at ~35 kcal per 100 g, similar to raw.
